data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Schwank, Peter, Kånneby, Tobias (2014): Contribution to the freshwater gastrotrich fauna of wetland areas of southwestern Ontario (Canada) with redescriptions of seven species and a check-list for North America. Zootaxa 3811 (4): 463-490, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3811.4.3
